pages.text: tene bhava cadhavya, ane mom pheravi lidhum
(etala mate) ke teni pase eka andha avi gayo
tamane sum khabara kadaca te pavitrata prapta karato
athava sikhamana sambhalato ane tene sikhamana labha pahoncadati
je laparavahi kare che
teni tarapha to tame puratu dhyana api rahya cho
jo ke temana na sudharava thi tamara para ko'i dosa nathi
ane je vyakti tamari pase dodato ave che
ane te dari (pana) rahyo che
tame teni tarapha bedhyana cho
kadapi nahim, a kura'ana to eka upadesa che
je cahe tenathi sikha melave
(a to) pratisthita sastro mam (che)
je ucca kaksani ane pavitra che
eva lakhanarana hathamam che
je'o adaraniya ane pramanika che
allahani phitakara manavi para, te kevo apakari che
tenum allaha'e ka'i vastuthi sarjana karyu
tene eka tipa vade, pachi anumana para rakhyo tene
pachi tena mate marga sarala karyo
pachi tene mrtyu apyum, ane pachi kabaramam daphanavyo
pachi jyare icchase tene jivita kari dese
ko'i sanka nathi. Tene atyara sudhi allahana adesanum ajnapalananathi karyu
manavi potana bhojana tarapha dhyana dhare
Ni:Sanka ame ja musaladhara pani varasavyum
pachi ame ja dharatine ciri phadi
pachi ame ja temam anaja ugavyum
ane draksa ane sakabhaji'o
ane jaituna ane khajuro
ane harya-bharya bagica'o
ane phalo temaja (ghasa) caro (pana) ugavyo
tamara ane tamara pasu'o na phayada mate
basa! Jyare kana bahera kari nakhanari (kayamata) avi jase
te divase manavi potana sagabha'i thi
ane potani mata temaja pitathi
ane potani patni temaja putrothi bhagase
pratyeka vyaktine te divase potani ja padi hase
te divase ketalaya cahera camakata hase
(je) hasata temaja praphullita hase
ane ketalaya cahera'o para te divase dhula lageli hase
temana para kalasa chavayeli hase
te'o ja juthalavanara ane duracari hase
